reference.title: cxxFunctionTemplateParameters
reference.shortdesc: Container for elements to describe each of the template parameters of a function template.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFunctionTemplateParameters> element contains child elements that describe the template parameters of a function template.

example.title: Example
example.p: Then function templateFunction would have the cxxFunctionTemplateParameters element:
example.codeblock: <cxxFunctionTemplateParameters> <cxxFunctionTemplateParameter> <cxxFunctionTemplateParameterType>typename T</cxxFunctionTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the first function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxFunctionTemplateParameter> <cxxFunctionTemplateParameter> <cxxFunctionTemplateParameterType>typename U</cxxFunctionTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the second function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxFunctionTemplateParameter> </cxxFunctionTemplateParameters>
example.p: If the mandatory attributes are present they must be set thus:
